meta.title: Joshua "0xJoshua" | CEO, Azos
meta.description: Meet Joshua, the founder of Azos, building a stablecoin reserve for the regenerative economy backed by climate-positive real-world assets.

hero.name: Joshua "0xJoshua"
hero.title: Founder & CEO, Azos
hero.tagline: Turning speculation into sustainability with the world’s first climate-backed stablecoin.

about.summary: Joshua blends DC policy experience with Web3 engineering to build Azos—the stablecoin reserve supporting climate-positive collateral and permissionless credit.

origin_story.headline: From policy halls to regenerative finance.
origin_story.copy: After years operating in Washington D.C. and Web3 communities like SportDAO and CryptoChicks, Joshua launched Azos to align DeFi incentives with climate resilience.

inflection_point.headline: Live demo that won Ethereum Phoenix.
inflection_point.copy: At ETHPhoenix and BitAngels, Joshua’s live CDP demo minted AZUSD on stage—proving that climate-backed stablecoins can be as seamless as any DeFi product.

mission.headline: Build the reserve currency of the regenerative economy.

pillars.title: Impact Collateral
pillars.description: Back AZUSD with renewable energy certificates, carbon credits, green bonds, and climate-positive debt.

pillars.title: Permissionless Credit
pillars.description: Offer instant loans without banks, paperwork, or credit checks—24/7 liquidity secured by on-chain assets.

pillars.title: Values-Aligned Money
pillars.description: Let every transaction fund sustainable infrastructure while delivering competitive yields.

project.name: Azos Finance
project.problem: Stablecoins either rely on opaque centralized treasuries or speculative DeFi loops, ignoring real-world impact.
project.solution: Azos issues AZUSD, a Base-native stablecoin collateralized by climate-positive RWAs and governed by third-generation AMO technology for automated supply management.
value_proposition: Mint AZUSD against climate collateral and earn yields that fund renewable infrastructure.
Open collateralized debt positions (CDPs) with ETH and receive instant, permissionless credit.
Convert speculation into sustainability by letting traders support carbon removal, solar, and resilient municipal projects.

experience.headline: DeFi, meet regenerative finance.
copy: Launch the Azos app, connect your wallet on Base, and open a CDP in minutes.
Track collateral backed by partners like KlimaDAO, Helios, Glo Dollar, and Power Ledger.
Join a community that explains collateral, liquidations, and impact in plain language—or talk directly with the team on Discord.

features: Real-world asset integrations: carbon credits, RECs, PPAs, impact bonds
Permissionless lending protocol with instant liquidity
Transparent collateral map and impact reporting

traction.ecosystem: Partnerships across KlimaDAO, Helios, Glo Dollar, Toucan, Base, Gitcoin, Regen Network, and more.
traction.pilots: Exploring municipal pilots in regions like Baltimore and Arizona to fund water security and climate resilience.

call_to_action.headline: Ready to mint the future of money?

highlights: Championing third-generation DeFi that turns climate debt into collateral.
Built a live demo that opened a CDP and minted AZUSD on stage—judges called it the moment of ETHPhoenix.
Believes Arizona can fund water security and sustainable infrastructure by putting municipal bonds on-chain.
Former DC operator now advocating for sensible crypto policy alongside Stand With Crypto.
Assembled a trusted team of Web3 builders—penguin (CTO), gnOme (VP Engineering), Salky (Web3 Dev), Bohn (Design), Kristy (COO).

quotes.speaker: Joshua
quotes.text: The reason we exist—the good side of crypto—is that dollars aren’t backed by anything. We can do better.

quotes.speaker: Joshua
quotes.text: We built a fundamentally stable DeFi platform that happens to use climate debt and climate finance assets as collateral.

quotes.speaker: Joshua
quotes.text: We’re not asking for donations. Use this platform, make money, and let sustainable projects share in the upside.

quotes.speaker: Joshua
quotes.text: If we can put municipal climate bonds on chain and let the world speculate on them—game over for funding shortfalls.

timeline.event: Built relationships in Washington D.C., advocating for sensible crypto regulation.
Served on the board of SportDAO and collaborated with CryptoChicks, deepening ties to global founders.
Assembled the Azos team and launched AMO-driven stablecoin research focused on climate collateral.
Demonstrated AZUSD live, opening CDPs with ETH and showcasing climate-backed collateral to BitAngels judges.
Expanding pilots with municipal partners and impact asset providers to fund resilient infrastructure.
